trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Grove City
There were no other sightings in Grove City on or around June 19th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsApprox 10:30pm, I noticed the pulsating stars lining up and flashing more prominently last night, just like the first time I observed the Orange orb(last week.) So I went to the front of my house to look for the orange orb that I saw there previously and less than a minute later I saw the solid, orange, glowing, non-blinking ball traveling West to East again. However, this time I noticed it hover a second and slightly adjust path from it straight line and then descend below the tree-line and out of view. At 10:58pm , I was back in my back yard and noticed a bright flash of light in a constellation that was low in the southeastern sky. The week before I observed a dark object traveling through the sky and then flashing when it hit the handle of the Big Dipper constellation.
Summary: Another Solid Orange Orb flying West to East
